greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: "Sloping quaternary numbers": write numbers in quaternary under each other (right-justified), read diagonals in upward direction, convert to decimal.
link: Seiichi Manyama, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
program: ary << (0..i).inject(0){|s, k| s + (j + k).to_s(m)[-1 - k].to_i * m ** k}
xref: Cf. A102370 (base 2), A109681 (base3), this sequence (base 4), A325645 (base 5), A325692 (base 6), A325693 (base 7), A325805 (base 8), A325829 (base 9), A103205 (base 10).
results.author: _Seiichi Manyama_, Sep 07 2019
